snippet: The committee that puts together the field of 68 teams will be granted more flexibility to set the first four and give No. 2 seeds more favorable matchups.
abstract: NCAA announces new rules that will allow selection committee greater flexibility in setting the First Four and No 2 seed matchups during Division 1 men's basketball tournament, change that it hopes will result in greater fairness.
lead_paragraph: The committee that puts together the field of 68 teams will be granted more flexibility to set the first four and give No. 2 seeds more favorable matchups.

headline.main: Changes Set for N.C.A.A. Basketball Tournament
